item.excerpt:encoded: The waterfall at Mill Creek is a great spot for swimming and lounging. Just don't try to jump in!

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Riders skirt the edge of Gooseberry Mesa on Windmill Trail during a guided mountain bike tour
Mountain bike riders regroup at the South Point lunch spot on Gooseberry Mesa during guided tour
Gooseberry Mesa is a maze of technical singletrack
A guide enjoys a bonfire at sunset on a 4-day guided mountain bike tour of Gooseberry Mesa
Looking over the edge of Gooseberry Mesa, St. George, southwest UT guided mountain bike tour
Threading the Needle, Gooseberry Mesa, St George, in southwestern utah
